name: dicom-send
label: DICOM Send
description: DICOM Send utilizes DCMTK's storescu to send DICOM data from a Flywheel instance to a destination DICOM server, hosted externally. This Gear supports the transmission of individual DICOM files and archives, as well as the transmission of an entire session when a specific input is not provided. Note that a private tag is added to each DICOM file to be transmitted (Flywheel:DICOM Send, at group 0x0021). Importantly, the external DICOM server must be reachable from the engine host of the Flywheel instance.

file.description: Any DICOM file or an archive (zip or tar) containing DICOM file(s). Non DICOM files are ignored. If no input is provided, all DICOM files in the session where the Gear is executed are downloaded and used as input.

key.description: TLS key.  Needed if tls is enabled

cert.description: TLS cert.  Needed if tls is enabled.

add_cert_file.description: Optional Cert file to add to list of certificates

destination.description: The IP address or hostname of the destination DICOM server. Note: The server must be reachable from the engine host of the Flywheel instance.

called_ae.description: The Called AE title of the receiving DICOM server.

calling_ae.description: The Calling AE title. Default = flywheel

port.description: Port number of the listening DICOM service. Default = 104

tls_enabled.description: Enable or disable TLS normal or anonymous

tls_use_pem.description: Use PEM format (True) or DER format (False). Default PEM (True)

tls_security_profile.description: TLS security profile to use, default BCP 195

tls_require_peer_cert.description: Verify peer certificate, fail if absent

tls_ciphers.description: Comma separated list of ciphers to add to the default list.

author: Flywheel
